pages.text: When an AND Routing is used, the Minecart will only divert if all routing inputs would divert $(br2) ROUTING {$(br)  AND {$(br)    TRUE {$(br)    }$(br)    TRUE {$(br)    }$(br)  }$(br)}
When an OR Routing is used, the Minecart will divert as only as any routing input would divert $(br2) ROUTING {$(br)  OR {$(br)    TRUE {$(br)    }$(br)    FALSE {$(br)    }$(br)  }$(br)}
When a NOT Routing is used, the Minecart will divert as only if the single routing input would not divert $(br2) ROUTING {$(br)  NOT {$(br)    FALSE {$(br)    }$(br)  }$(br)}
